subject: price for doctor & hospital data goes up after may 4
body:
LAST CHANCE! SALE ENDS FRIDAY MAY 4 - ORDER NOW!

Database 1:	780,000 Physicians in the USA
		Arranged by State
		Sortable by more than a dozen different fields
		including specialty
		COST: $299 

Database 2:	17,400 Physician Email Addresses
		Arranged by State
		Contains first & last name, email, postal address and
		specialty
		COST: $199 

Database 3:	23,000 Hospital Administrators
		Featuring full data on CEO,CFO,CIO,COO,
		Medical Directors,Nursing Directors,Senior Administrator
		COST: $199 

Also, I can offer you all 3 databases above for just $449 

Let me know if you need any more info or would like to order. You can
contact me by email: medical.data@hotmail.com   or by phone: (206) 984-0935 

NOTE: For faster service, please respond via email. 

Should you be in a position where you do not wish to be sent any additional 
correspondence from us please send an email with 86 in the subject line.
